description: Leading the development of UHC's mobile app built in React Native and used by millions via partnerships between backend, product, and UX teams to deliver seamless, user-friendly experiences. Long-term maintainability, reliability, and performance is achieved through code reviews, enforcing coding standards, mentoring junior developers, and maintaining strong test coverage.
responsibilities: Led development and maintenance of scalable, high-performance React and React Native applications used by millions of people
Collaborated with backend and product teams to deliver seamless integrations and support project planning
Conducted code reviews, enforced best practices, and mentored junior and mid-level developers
Partnered with UX/UI to translate designs into responsive, user-friendly interfaces
Maintained strong test coverage using Jest and E2E tools to ensure reliability and reduce defects
Established and enforced coding standards to ensure a consistent, maintainable codebase
title: Optum
Digital
